answers.answer: do you have diabetes?  get your HbA1C checked.i would also see a neurologist to see if you have a nerve compression that is exacerbated with standing.  He/she can do a nerve conduction study and EMG.

question: The bottoms of my feet felt less sensitive........not completely numb.  Now it is the sides of my feet too.   When I am on my feet a lot, the numbness goes up to my ankes in places.  This does not hurt, just feels odd.
title: numb feet
